name: Escape From Alien
description:
New top battle on the fantasy forest offline games, It's time for the new adventure to action your mission to escape from alien, Your task is how far you can go and against the monsters, Buy health and energy to continue your adventure make a better distance, Use a bomb to destroy
the enemies line in AOE. Have Fun!
---------------------------
TIPS:
-Live give you 1UP but also upgrade HEALTH and ENERGY
-You can buy items from shop
-Use BOMB to decrease their revive time
-Don't Forget give me a rate
---------------------------
SHOP FEATURES:
-Energy
-Lives
-Bomb
-Life

CREDIT:
